Module it.polimi.ingsw.am45
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.GUI

Class Score_View

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.GUI.Score_View
public class Score_View extends Object
Class for the representation of leaderboard. It uses the Singleton design pattern to ensure that only one instance of the Score_View exists.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The singleton instance of the Score_View.

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the score view. Set up the Vbox and empty the messages queue.

    • updateScore

      public void updateScore(Stack<String> players, Stack<Long> pings, Stack<Integer> points)
      Updates the score with the given players, pings, and points.
      Parameters:
      players - The players to update the score for.
      pings - The pings of the players.
      points - The points of the players.

      Cleans the leaderboard view by clearing all panes.
